scripts.server:dev: concurrently "nodemon --watch src/presentation/rest/**/*Controller.ts --ext ts,js -x npx tsoa spec-and-routes" "nodemon --ignore src/presentation/web/ --ignore src/presentation/rest/**/*Controller.ts -r tsconfig-paths/register src/server.ts"
scripts.server:dev:debug: concurrently "nodemon --watch "src/presentation/rest/**/*Controller.ts" --ext "ts,js" -x npx tsoa spec-and-routes" "nodemon --ignore "src/presentation/rest/**/*Controller.ts" --ignore "src/presentation/web/" --exec node --inspect-brk=9229 -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register src/server.ts"
scripts.server:build: npm run prebuild && tsoa spec-and-routes && tsc -p tsconfig-build.json && shx cp ./tsconfig*.json ./build/
scripts.server:build:production: npm run prebuild && tsoa spec-and-routes -c tsoa-build.json && tsc -p tsconfig-build.json && shx cp ./tsconfig*.json ./build/
scripts.tools:copy-web: shx echo "Copy web app from ./src/presentation/web/build to ./build/src/presentation/web/" && shx mkdir -p ./build/src/presentation/web/build && shx cp -R ./src/presentation/web/build ./build/src/presentation/web/
scripts.build:dev: npm run server:build && npm run tools:generate-client-react && npm run web:build && npm run tools:copy-web
scripts.build: npm run server:build:production && npm run tools:generate-client-react && npm run web:build && npm run tools:copy-web
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "nodemon --watch"src/presentation/rest/generated/swagger.json" --ext "json" -x npm run tools:generate-client-react" "npm run web:dev"
scripts.test: npm run server:test && npm run web:test
